hero.title:
Turn your ideas into solutions.
Innovate with Coreasofts.
hero.subtitle: Choose the expertise you need to bring your projects to life, digitize your activity or launch your start-up. Coreasofts supports you with tailor‑made solutions.

vision.title: Our Vision
vision.lead: Become the leader in digital innovation in Africa.
vision.text: Coreasofts aims to transform businesses sustainably, energize entrepreneurship and improve the daily lives of African citizens through smart technologies that are accessible and impactful.

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.lead: Support those who build the Africa of tomorrow.
mission.text: We provide innovative services in strategy, digital enablement, app development, event organization and mechanical engineering. Our commitment: turning your ideas into concrete solutions.

values.title: Our Values
values.lead: What guides each of our actions.
items: Innovation: push boundaries to create modern and relevant solutions
Commitment: stand by our clients until success
Collaboration: build together with trust and transparency
Excellence: aim for maximum quality in every project

intro.title: What we do
intro.text: At Coreasofts, we combine innovation, expertise and commitment to address our clients' digital challenges. Our services cover every stage of digital transformation, from strategy to concrete implementation. We support you with solutions that are tailored, sustainable and designed for today's and tomorrow's Africa.

strabus.title: Strabus - Business Strategy
strabus.text: We help you structure, reposition or launch your business with a clear, realistic and goal‑aligned strategy. Strabus supports your key decisions to ensure growth and sustainability.

acconum.title: Acconum - Digital Enablement
acconum.text: From planning to execution, Acconum drives your transition to digital. We digitize your tools, processes and channels to improve efficiency and strengthen your impact in a connected world.

devapp.title: Devapp - App Development
devapp.text: Whether web or mobile, we develop robust, ergonomic and scalable applications perfectly adapted to your business needs and target audience.

event.title: Corea-Event - Event Organization
event.text: We design and organize professional events (workshops, forums, fairs) that showcase innovation, strengthen synergies and foster tomorrow's talents.

meca.title: Corea-Meca - Mechanical Solutions
meca.text: From engineering to manufacturing, Corea-Meca designs technical and mechanical solutions adapted to African realities to meet the needs of industrial and productive sectors.

faq.title: FAQs
faq.subtitle: Here are answers to the most frequent questions about our services, how we work and our support.

items.q: What types of clients do you support?
items.a: We work with businesses of all sizes, from startups to large institutions, as well as individual entrepreneurs. Each project is tailored to your goals and sector.
Yes, we provide tailor‑made solutions based on your specific needs and constraints.

items.q: Do I need a specifications document to contact you?
items.a: No, we can help formalize it together from the start of the project.
Timelines vary depending on project complexity, but we always work to optimize delivery times.

items.q: Do you only work in the DRC?
items.a: No, we work with clients worldwide.

items.q: How can I start a project with you?
items.a: You can contact us directly via our contact form or by email, and we will respond promptly.
